paper_meta.Paper_title: Extraction-Free Detection of SARS-CoV-2 Viral RNA Using LumiraDx's RNA Star Complete Assay from Clinical Nasal Swabs Stored in a Novel Collection and Transport Medium.

protocols.Paper_title: Extraction-Free Detection of SARS-CoV-2 Viral RNA Using LumiraDx’s RNA Star Complete Assay from Clinical Nasal Swabs Stored in a Novel Collection and Transport Medium
Methods: other:direct-add proprietary Extraction Buffer pre-processing (pipette-mix); no separate nucleic-acid extraction described for LumiraDx RSC workflow

protocols.Paper_title: Extraction-Free Detection of SARS-CoV-2 Viral RNA Using LumiraDx’s RNA Star Complete Assay from Clinical Nasal Swabs Stored in a Novel Collection and Transport Medium
Methods: other:spin-column viral RNA extraction (QIAamp RNA Viral Mini Kit; lysis buffer + column-based purification) prior to RT-qPCR comparator testing
